name: An exquisite platinum diadem with emeralds
data: It increases the users wisdom impressively.
It increases the users charisma adequately.
It has non-existent armour class for its type (non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration a good amount.
This item loses its magical powers extremely slowly.
It increases the users asphyxiation resistance somewhat.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'arcane lore'.
